headline: US Oil Drillers Continue to Back Off On Price Slump
summary: The total number of active drilling rigs for oil and gas in the United States fell yet again this week, according to new data that Baker Hughes published on Thursday

raw.headline: US Oil Drillers Continue to Back Off On Price Slump
raw.summary: The total number of active drilling rigs for oil and gas in the United States fell yet again this week, according to new data that Baker Hughes published on Thursday

headline: US drillers cut oil and gas rigs for 10th week in a row, Baker Hughes says
summary: Baker Hughes released the report a day earlier than usual on Thursday due to the U.S. July Fourth holiday on Friday.  This week's decline puts the total rig count down 46 rigs, or 8% below this time last year, Baker Hughes said.  Oil rigs fell by seven to 425 this week, their lowest since September 2021, while gas rigs fell by one to 108.
